gov.lbl.glamm.client.rpc
Interface GlammService

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService
All Known Implementing Classes:
GlammServiceImpl
@RemoteServiceRelativePath(value="rpc")
public interface GlammService
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

RPC interface for GLAMM client-server communication.

Author:
jtbates

Method Detail

authenticateUser

User authenticateUser(java.lang.String userId,
                      java.lang.String auth)
Authenticates the user based on the user id and the contents of the MicrobesOnline "auth" cookie.

Parameters:
userId - The user id.
auth - The contents of the MicrobesOnline "auth" cookie.
Returns:
The authenticated User - guest User if authentication fails.

genCpdPopup

java.lang.String genCpdPopup(Compound compound,
                             Organism organism)
Generates the HTML for a compound popup.

Parameters:
compound - The compound.
organism - The organism associated with this popup.
Returns:
The popup HTML.

genCpdPopup

java.lang.String genCpdPopup(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ids,
                             Organism organism)
Generates the HTML for a compound popup.

Parameters:
ids - The set of ids for the compounds in this popup.
organism - The organism associated with this popup.
Returns:
The popup HTML.

genPwyPopup

java.lang.String genPwyPopup(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ids,
                             Organism organism,
                             Sample sample)
Generates the HTML for a pathway popup - the popup will contain a link back to the MicrobesOnline pathway page, which will include the microarray data overlay for the specified experiment and sample.

Parameters:
ids - The set of ids for the pathways in this popup.
organism - The organism associated with this popup.
sample - The sample associated with this popup.
Returns:
The popup HTML.

getAnnotatedMapDescriptors

java.util.List<AnnotatedMapDescriptor> getAnnotatedMapDescriptors()
Gets the list of available annotated map descriptors.

Returns:
A list of annotated map descriptors.

getAvailableSampleTypes

java.util.List<Sample.DataType> getAvailableSampleTypes()
Gets the list of available sample types. The content of list is dependent on the access level of the user.

Returns:
The list.

getDirections

java.util.List<Pathway> getDirections(Organism organism,
                                      Compound cpdSrc,
                                      Compound cpdDst,
                                      java.lang.String mapTitle,
                                      Algorithm algorithm)
Gets directions (i.e. retrosynthetic pathway routes) between the source and destination compounds.

Parameters:
organism - The organism associated with this popup.
cpdSrc - The source compound.
cpdDst - The destination compound.
mapTitle - The title of the map.
algorithm - The algorithm used to find these routes.
Returns:
A list of pathways.

getIsolateHost

java.lang.String getIsolateHost()
Gets the host name for isolate organism links. (Typically MicrobesOnline.)

Returns:
The host name.

getSample

java.util.Set<? extends HasMeasurements> getSample(Sample sample)
Gets a set of object implementing the HasMeasurements interface and their associated measurements for a given sample.

Parameters:
sample - The sample
Returns:
The set of objects.

getMetagenomeHost

java.lang.String getMetagenomeHost()
Gets the host name for metagenome organism links. (Typically MetaMicrobesOnline.)

Returns:
The host name.

getReactions

java.util.Set<Reaction> getReactions(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ids,
                                     Organism organism,
                                     Sample sample)
Gets a set of reactions for a particular organism. If the sample is specified, measurements are associated with those reactions.

Parameters:
ids - The reaction ids.
organism - The organism.
sample - The sample.
Returns:
The set of reactions.

getRxnsForOrganism

java.util.Set<Reaction> getRxnsForOrganism(Organism organism)
Gets the set of reactions possible for an organism.

Parameters:
organism - The organism.
Returns:
The set of reactions.

getLoggedInUser

User getLoggedInUser()
Gets the user logged in for the current session.

Returns:
The user.

logOutUser

void logOutUser()
Logs out theuser loggedin for the current session.

populateCompoundSearch

java.util.Set<Compound> populateCompoundSearch(java.lang.String mapId)
Gets the set of compounds visible on a map with a given mapId, used to populate the compound search box.

Parameters:
mapId - The map id.
Returns:
The set of compounds.

populateLocusSearch

java.util.Set<Gene> populateLocusSearch(Organism organism)
Gets the set of genes available for an organism.

Parameters:
organism - The organism.
Returns:
The set of genes.

populateReactionSearch

java.util.Set<Reaction> populateReactionSearch(java.lang.String mapId)
Gets the set of reactions visible on a map with a given map Id, used to populate the search box.

Parameters:
mapId - The map id.
Returns:
The set of reactions.

populateOrganisms

java.util.List<Organism> populateOrganisms(Sample.DataType dataType)
Gets the list of available organisms with samples available for a given data type. The content of list is dependent on the access level of the user.

Parameters:
dataType - The data type.
Returns:
The list of organisms, in alphabetical order by species name, with user-uploaded (session) organisms listed first.

populateSamples

java.util.List<Sample> populateSamples(Organism organism)
Gets the list of available samples for a given organism. The content of list is dependent on the access level of the user.

Parameters:
organism - The organism.
Returns:
The list of samples.
